dialog: Spicy-tangy soup brewed with fire.
What magic do you mix with it?
Ginger, garlic scallion, hot pepper, and vinegar will do the trick.
Excellent, shall I assist?
No need, I can cast spells on my own.
Thank you, now I can watch the magical moving picture box.
Next time, you must conjure the dinner, though.
Agreed, I will work my culinary magic next time.
Greetings, I am Mike, of the house of Kara.
Mike, it's a pleasure to hear from you. How fare thee?
All is well, and yourself?
I am thriving, thanks.
Kara, I enjoyed our outing to the magical moving picture box the other night and was wondering if you'd like to join me again this Friday.
Mike, I don't think it's wise to socialize at the moment. I am focused on packing for my return to my family home.
We could meet for a cup of tea, perhaps?
I cannot afford any distractions right now, but I am grateful for the lovely evening we shared.
Sunset Inn, may I be of assistance?
Indeed, I have reserved a room for the 24th. A double, if you please.
One moment, I shall check. Yes, that is correct. You will be staying for three days.
I have decided to change the reservation from the 24th to the 28th.
